oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: [Non-digitzed] Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1942-07-18 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Bill Monroe; Blue Grass Boys; Mac McGar; Roy Acuff; Tommy Thompson; Howdy Forrester
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) [continued from part 1] -- You Are My Sunshine (Minnie Pearl) -- George D. Hay introduces Bill Monroe and his Blue Grass Boys -- He Will Set Your Fields On Fire (Bill Monroe and his Blue Grass Boys) -- Prince Albert commercial (Pap, Louie Buck) -- George D. Hay introduces Mac McGar -- Turkey In The Straw (Mac McGar) -- Prince Albert commercial (George D. Hay, Bashful Brother Oswald) -- I Called And Nobody Answered (Roy Acuff) -- Traveling Camel Caravan announcement (Louie Buck) -- Raw materials for war effort P.S.A. (Louie Buck, George D. Hay) -- Prince Albert commercial (Roy Acuff, George D. Hay, Louie Buck) -- Ida Red (Roy Acuff) -- Closing statement (George D. Hay, Bashful Brother Oswald) -- Network ID (David Cobb) -- [Unidentified mandolin instrumental] -- David Cobb introduces Tommy Thompson and Howdy Forrester -- Home On The Range (Tommy Thompson, Howdy Forrester) (incomplete)
